channel.title: Editing . cfgs
channel.description:
When i edit them they dont work i getawhoel bunch of erros adn crap so i cant add items/shops. I can only edit whats in game.
Some one said something about some notepad progam to download but i forgot what it is called?
Any one have any ideas?
Thanks :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2008, 10:40:07 AM[/size][hr] anyone?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2008, 11:05:44 AM[/size][hr]fffs :)
